switch_operate_flow_start.description: Operate the switch to initiate the water flow.

switch_operate_flow_stop.description: Operate the switch to halt the water flow.

check_flow_switch.description: Operate the switch to cross-check water flow

sterilize_switch.description: Sanitize the switch by cleaning it.

rotate_switch_to_start.description: Rotate the switch to start the flow of water.

rotate_switch_to_stop.description: Rotate the switch to stop the flow of water.

press_to_start_flow.description: Press the switch to start the flow of water.

press_to_stop_flow.description: Press the switch to stop the flow of water.

activate_switch.description: Press the switch to open the tap.

deactivate_switch.description: Press the switch to close the tap.

sanitize_switch.description: Wipe the switch to clean it.

rotate_switch_off.description: Rotate the switch to turn off the faucet.

rotate_switch_on.description: Rotate the switch to turn on the faucet.

press_switch.description: Press the switch to control the water flow.

wipe_switch.description: Wipe the switch to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to control the water flow.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch to ensure smooth operation.

sanitize_faucet_base.description: Sanitize the base of the faucet by cleaning it.

check_faucet_base.description: Check the base of the faucet by wiping it.

clean_base_for_maintenance.description: Clean the base of the faucet to maintain cleanliness.

clean_faucet_base.description: Wipe the base of the faucet to remove any dirt or residues.

wipe_down_base.description: Wipe down the base of the faucet to maintain hygiene.

clean_base.description: Clean the base of the faucet to maintain hygiene.

sanitize_spout.description: Clean the spout by wiping to ensure cleanliness and hygiene.

check_spout.description: Check the spout by wiping it.

clean_spout_for_flow.description: Clean the spout by wiping it to ensure smooth water flow.

wipe_clean_spout.description: Wipe clean the spout to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

clean_spout.description: Clean the spout to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

full_faucet_usage_operation.description: Rotate the switch to activate the flow, stop it and then clean the entire faucet.

complete_faucet_operation_with_check.description: Operate the faucet, check its functionality and clean it entirely.

full_operation_clean.description: Start the faucet by pressing the switch, stop the faucet then clean the switch, spout and base.

full_rotational_operation_clean.description: Start the faucet by rotating the switch to the on position, stop the faucet by rotating the switch to the off position, then clean the spout and base.

clean_entire_faucet.description: Wipe all parts of the faucet to clean it.

operate_and_clean.description: Press the switch to operate the water flow and wipe it clean.

complete_faucet_cleaning.description: Wipe all parts of the faucet to maintain hygiene and operations.

total_clean_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet, including the switch, base, and spout.

press_and_clean.description: Press the switch to control the water flow and then clean the switch.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet, including the switch, base, and spout.
